root.description: OverviewRoller Coaster Rampage is a simulation game developed and published by Pantera Entertainment for the PC platform.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows XP or laterProcessor: 2.2 GHz dual core processorMemory: 2 GB RAMHard Disk Space: 2 GBVideo Card: Nvidia 8800 GPUDirectXÂ®: DirectX 9.0Sound:DirectX compatible
